name: Bathroom Trash Everywhere
description: Sweeten to taste.  A creamy sweet frozen yogurt topped with sweet blackberry sauce.
author: Freshepies

reviews.text: WOW fresh this is a phenomenal recipe I only wish I would’ve found it sooner I can’t believe I’m gonna miss out on almost a full year I could have been living this .this simple mix is for real no hype one on my favorite recipes of this year great job man , truly the yogurt king .!!!

Really enjoyed this quick and easy to mix up. Has a really great blackberry note and the boysenberry really jams the fruit up. The frozen yogurt and whipped cream blend perfectly to make a lovely yogurt/cream based excellent job.
